thread.title: Jan De Troyer/ Anita Meulens
thread.title_full: Travelbird Beoordeeld door Jan De Troyer/ Anita Meulens

author: Jan De Troyer/ Anita Meulens
title: Jan De Troyer/ Anita Meulens
text: After 3 trips with Travelbird - two in Italy and one to Lanzarote - we can only say that each time we were surprized by excellent price/quality combination. Travelbird picks its hotels very well: they are not located in overcrowded tourist centres but in original settings nearby the much more expensive centres. Taking in account the competitive prizes, one would expect some small problems, but until now we didn't have any. We look forward to our next trip.
